argument.description: The arguments must be integer values represented by the data types SMALLINT, INTEGER, BIGINT, or DECFLOAT.
The arguments must be integer values represented by the data types SMALLINT, INTEGER, BIGINT, or DECFLOAT.
The arguments must be integer values represented by the data types SMALLINT, INTEGER, BIGINT, or DECFLOAT.

description: These bitwise functions operate on the "two's complement" representation of the integer value of the input arguments and return the result as a corresponding base 10 integer value in a data type based on the data type of the input arguments.
sample:
SELECT ITEMID FROM ITEM
     WHERE BITAND(PROPERTIES, 4) = 4
